settings.heading: WHAT'S YOUR REFUND POLICY?
settings.row_content: We have a 100% money back guarantee. If you receive your order and don't like them, simply email us and we will offer you a refund no questions asked! We believe so strongly in our product we are happy to offer this guarantee. Email us hello@sinlesssnacks.com.

settings.heading: WHEN WILL MY ORDER SHIP?
settings.row_content: All order payments are processed immediately. Once we receive your order it will be shipped within 24-48 hours of being processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for standard delivery.

settings.heading: DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?
settings.row_content: We currently only ship within the United States of America. We are currently working on expanding international shipping!

settings.heading: ARE SINLESS SNACK BARS GLUTEN FREE?
settings.row_content: Yes, our keto bars are gluten free!

settings.heading: WHAT IS ALLULOSE?
settings.row_content: Allulose is a low-calorie sweetener with the same clean, sweet taste you expect from sugar. Researchers and the United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA), have found Allulose is not metabolized by the body and therefore has no impact on blood sugar levels.

settings.heading: HOW LONG DO SINLESS SNACK BARS LAST?
settings.row_content: Our keto bars have a 12 month shelf-life, but we don’t expect you to resist the soft, chewy goodness for that long :)

settings.heading: GOT MORE QUESTIONS?
settings.row_content: You can email us directly hello@sinlesssnacks.com. We will do our best to reply within 24 hours.
